description:
Bills Vs. Income is an easy to use personal financial management tool that aims for one thing: keeping it simple!  This app is built around watching your income, bills, & budgets on a month to month basis.  Bill Vs. Income is aimed for those that don't want to enter every little transaction down to the penny, but would still like to know how much money that can expect to have left over at the end of the month, or how much they'll have a few months from now.  

Some features that set Bills Vs Income apart from others:
-Unpaid Bill reminders utilizes webOS Notifications so you never miss a bill's due date again

-Dynamic icon updates to show you how many bills are due in the next few days, and also how many bills are overdue without the need to open the program.  View this information right from the App Launcher!

-Calendar view

-Simple monthly budget management without the need to enter values for every single transaction

Updates: 
2.0.0: Big update!  Data processing completely redone.  App is now faster and more efficient than before.  Added dynamic icons, calendar view, & numerous other features and fixes.

Note: Those updating from the free version, in order to export your data to the Full Version, you must upgrade both the Free and Full Versions to the latest version.  You may then transfer your data by using the Export button found in the help menu of the Free Version.
  
Any other ideas or bugs please e-mail them to the developer at MachiApps1@gmail.com.

Free Version also available in app catalog.
